oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Guerillas burning steamers on the Cumberland River
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Confederate guerillas attacking Union steamships somewhere on the Cumberland River.

Bands of armed guerillas and raids by Confederate cavalry often disrupted federal transportation in Tennessee. Railroad lines in Middle Tennessee and river routes on the Cumberland and Tennessee Rivers were particularly vulnerable.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Guerrilla warfare--History; Steamboats; Cumberland River (Ky.and Tenn.); Confederate States of America--History
Ships
